title: Forge + Bond CR Series Road Wheels
content:
Forge + Bond, the carbon manufacturer known for its recyclable bicycle wheels and components, just announced an all-new set of road wheels…

The CR Series is engineered to offer performance and comfort on every ride, the CR Series wheels are designed for everyday encounters, providing road riders unmatched responsiveness and power transfer without sacrificing a smooth, fatigue-reducing ride.

F+B CR 35 Wheelset

This lightweight climbing wheelset prioritizes efficiency and responsiveness, making it ideal for conquering steep ascents and maximizing power transfer.

  • Hub options: I9 Torch $2,199, DT Swiss 350 $2,199, F+B SHIFT $1,250
  • Rim Depth: 35 mm
  • Outer Rim Width: 30.5 mm
  • Inner Rim Width: 25 mm
  • Bead Wall Thickness: 2.65 mm
  • Spoke Count: 24h
  • Spoke: Sapim CX-Ray
  • Rim Type: Hookless/Tubeless
  • Tire Size Range: Built for 28-32 mm, up to 47 mm
  • Max Tire Pressure: 28 mm – 70psi, 32 mm – 70psi, 40 mm – 50psi
  • Wheelset Weights:
    I9 Torch HG: 1473g
    I9 Torch XD: 1485g
    DT Swiss 350 HG: 1565g
    DT Swiss 350 XD: 1578g
    F+B SHIFT HG: 1510g
    F+B SHIFT XD: 1506g

F+B CR 45 Wheelset

Built for those seeking a wider rim profile for enhanced aerodynamic benefits and increased stability on longer rides.

  • Hub options: I9 Torch $2,199, DT Swiss 350 $2,199, F+B SHIFT $1,250
  • Rim Depth: 45 mm
  • Outer Rim Width: 30.5 mm
  • Inner Rim Width: 25 mm
  • Bead Wall Thickness: 2.7 mm
  • Spoke Count: 24h
  • Spoke: Sapim CX-Ray
  • Rim Type: Hookless/Tubeless
  • Tire Size Range: Built for 28-32 mm, up to 47 mm
  • Max Tire Pressure: 28 mm – 70psi, 32 mm – 70psi, 40 mm – 50psi
  • Wheelset Weights:
    I9 Torch HG: 1566g
    I9 Torch XD: 1546g
    DT Swiss 350 HG: 1658g
    DT Swiss 350 XD: 1671g
    F+B SHIFT HG: 1608g
    F+B SHIFT XD: 1584g
